metrics.name: Precision
metrics.description: Fraction of correctly predicted positive pairs among all predicted positive pairs.

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Fraction of correctly predicted positive pairs among all actual positive pairs.

metrics.name: F1
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall.

metrics.name: F1
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of Precision and Recall, measuring matching accuracy of entity resolution.

metrics.name: API Cost
metrics.description: Monetary cost for API calls to LLMs, measured in US dollars.

metrics.name: Labeling Cost
metrics.description: Monetary cost for labeling entity pairs to prepare demonstrations, estimated from crowdsourcing rates.

metrics.name: F1 score
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall for the binary classification of matching vs. non-matching entities.

metrics.name: F1-score
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall; measures ER quality

metrics.name: F1-score
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall for entity matching.

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Proportion of true matches correctly identified by the blocker.

metrics.name: Accuracy
metrics.description: Proportion of correctly clustered records according to the ground truth clusters.
metrics.formulation: \mathrm{ACC}=\frac{\text { CorrectCount }}{|\Re|} \quad \text { CorrectCount }=\sum_{X_{j} \in \mathbb{X}} \sum_{x \in X_{j}} \mathbb{I}(\exists y \in M_{j}^{\prime}, y=x)

metrics.name: FP-measure
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of purity and inverse-purity, evaluating clustering homogeneity and stability.

metrics.name: Precision
metrics.description: Proportion of predicted matches that are correct

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Proportion of ground-truth matches that are predicted

metrics.name: F1-score
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Fraction of true matches retained after blocking; $R=|C \cap G| /|G|$, where $C$ is the blocking output and $G$ is the set of all gold matches.

metrics.name: Candidate Set Size Ratio
metrics.description: Ratio of candidate pairs output by the blocker to all possible pairs, $CSSR=|C| /|A \times B|$.

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Fraction of ground-truth matches retained after blocking and pruning

metrics.name: Precision
metrics.description: Fraction of predicted matches that are correct

metrics.name: F1
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall

metrics.name: Precision
metrics.description: Fraction of predicted duplicates that are correct

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Fraction of true duplicates that are retrieved

metrics.name: F1
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall, measuring accuracy of duplicate detection

metrics.name: Precision
metrics.description: Proportion of predicted matches that are correct.

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Proportion of ground truth matches that are correctly predicted.

metrics.name: F1
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall.

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Fraction of true matches covered by the candidate set after blocking

metrics.name: Candidate Set Size Ratio
metrics.description: Fraction of all possible pairs selected as candidates; lower is better

metrics.name: Hits@1
metrics.description: Fraction of correct entities ranked at position 1.

metrics.name: Hits@10
metrics.description: Fraction of correct entities ranked within top 10.

metrics.name: MRR
metrics.description: Mean Reciprocal Rank; average of reciprocal ranks for correct entities.

metrics.name: Precision
metrics.description: Proportion of predicted links that are correct.

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Proportion of true links that are recovered.

metrics.name: F1
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall.

metrics.name: Exact Match (EM)
metrics.description: Measures whether the predicted SQL exactly matches the ground truth.

metrics.name: Execution Accuracy (EX)
metrics.description: Measures whether the execution result of the predicted SQL matches the ground truth.

metrics.name: Precision
metrics.description: Proportion of correctly identified positive matches among all returned matches

metrics.name: Recall
metrics.description: Proportion of correctly identified positive matches among all true matches

metrics.name: F-score
metrics.description: Harmonic mean of precision and recall, measuring the overall match accuracy
